cast.overview: Andrew returns to his hometown for the funeral of his mother, a journey that reconnects him with past friends. The trip coincides with his decision to stop taking his powerful antidepressants. A chance meeting with Sam - a girl also suffering from various maladies - opens up the possibility of rekindling emotional attachments, confronting his psychologist father, and perhaps beginning a new life.
cast.title: Garden State

details.biography: Michael Weston is an American television and film actor. He is known for his role as Jake in the critically acclaimed HBO drama Six Feet Under and as the private detective Lucas Douglas on House.
details.name: Michael Weston
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
